title: TikTok users can't upload anti-ICE videos. The company blames tech issues
author: kotaKat
aiHeadline: TikTok users can't upload anti-ICE videos, and the company is blaming it on 'tech issues'—because nothing says 'we're not censoring you' like a conveniently timed glitch.

title: FBI is investigating Minnesota Signal chats tracking ICE
author: duxup
aiHeadline: The FBI is investigating Minnesota Signal chats that were tracking ICE, proving once again that the government's favorite hobby is spying on people who are spying on the government.

title: Cloudflare claimed they implemented Matrix on Cloudflare workers. They didn't
author: JadedBlueEyes
aiHeadline: Cloudflare claimed they implemented Matrix on Cloudflare workers, but don't worry—they're still as transparent as ever, just now they're transparent liars.

title: U.S. government has lost more than 10k STEM PhDs since Trump took office
author: j_maffe
aiHeadline: The U.S. government has lost more than 10,000 STEM PhDs since Trump took office, which is about the same number of brain cells the administration lost trying to figure out how to keep them.

title: Kimi Released Kimi K2.5, Open-Source Visual SOTA-Agentic Model
author: nekofneko
aiHeadline: Kimi released Kimi K2.5, an open-source visual SOTA-agentic model, because clearly the world needed another version number to keep up with the Kardashians.
